# AchievingCoach

> AchievingCoach is a professional coaching platform (plataforma de coaching ejecutivo) designed for executive coaches, life coaches, and career coaches. It provides 12+ interactive coaching tools aligned with ICF competencies, client management, AI-powered insights, and automated reporting to demonstrate coaching ROI.

AchievingCoach serves as the complete operating system (sistema operativo) for coaching practices. Coaches use it to manage clients, deliver assessments like DISC and Wheel of Life, track progress through structured 9-phase methodology, and generate professional reports for HR departments and corporate sponsors.

## Coaching Tools

- [DISC Assessment](https://achievingcoach.com/coach/tools/disc): Behavioral assessment for communication and leadership styles
- [Wheel of Life](https://achievingcoach.com/coach/tools/wheel-of-life): Life balance evaluation across 8-12 dimensions
- [GROW Model Worksheet](https://achievingcoach.com/coach/tools/grow): Goal-Reality-Options-Will framework for coaching conversations
- [Values Clarification](https://achievingcoach.com/coach/tools/values): Core values identification and prioritization exercise
- [Stakeholder Mapping](https://achievingcoach.com/coach/tools/stakeholder-mapping): Relationship and influence analysis for executives
- [Career Compass](https://achievingcoach.com/coach/tools/career-compass): Career direction and professional development planning
- [ICF Competency Simulator](https://achievingcoach.com/coach/icf-simulator): AI-powered practice for ICF core competencies

## Platform Features

- [Client Management](https://achievingcoach.com/coach/clients): Centralized profiles, session history, documents, and progress tracking
- [Session Scheduling](https://achievingcoach.com/coach/calendar): Google Calendar integration with automatic reminders
- [AI Insights](https://achievingcoach.com/features): Session analysis, pattern recognition, and coaching suggestions
- [Progress Reports](https://achievingcoach.com/coach/reports): Automated reports for clients, HR, and corporate sponsors
- [9-Phase Methodology](https://achievingcoach.com/features): Structured coaching framework from discovery to completion

## Pricing

- [Free Tier](https://achievingcoach.com/pricing): Get started with basic features at no cost
- [Premium Plan](https://achievingcoach.com/pricing): $29/month for individual coaches with full tool access
- [Enterprise Plan](https://achievingcoach.com/pricing): $99/month for coaching organizations with unlimited users

## Resources

- [Blog](https://achievingcoach.com/blog): Coaching methodologies, ICF competencies, and industry best practices
- [Features](https://achievingcoach.com/features): Complete platform capabilities overview
- [About](https://achievingcoach.com/about): Company mission and team

## Security

AchievingCoach uses enterprise-grade security: AES-256 encryption, GDPR/CCPA/HIPAA compliance, and granular permission controls. Data is hosted on Google Cloud with daily backups.

- [Sign Up](https://achievingcoach.com/sign-up): Create free coaching account

- [Contact](https://achievingcoach.com/contact): Support and sales inquiries
